lifeEvents.title: Eventos de Vida
lifeEvents.subtitle: Update your plan when major life changes occur
lifeEvents.addFirstEvent: Add your first life event to get started
lifeEvents.congratsMessage: Congratulations on your new child! Here are the recommended updates to your plan:

tasks.updateBeneficiariesDesc: Review and update beneficiaries on life insurance, retirement accounts, and bank accounts.
tasks.updateWillDesc: Ensure your will reflects your new marital status and beneficiary wishes.
tasks.reviewTrustsDesc: Make necessary changes to trust documents to reflect your new status.
tasks.updateEmergencyContactsDesc: Review and update emergency contacts in your Trusted Circle.
tasks.addChildRoster: Add your new child to your Trusted Circle
tasks.addChildRosterDesc: Include your child in your family information.
tasks.updateGuardian: Review and update the "Guardian" designation for your children
tasks.updateGuardianDesc: Ensure you have designated appropriate guardians for all your children.
tasks.reviewLifeInsurance: Review your life insurance policy to ensure coverage is adequate
tasks.reviewLifeInsuranceDesc: Consider increasing coverage to account for your growing family.
tasks.updateWillBeneficiary: Update your will to include your new child as a beneficiary
tasks.updateWillBeneficiaryDesc: Ensure your new child is properly included in your estate planning.
tasks.updatePropertyArmory: Update property information in your Vault
tasks.updatePropertyArmoryDesc: Add new property or remove sold property from your assets.
tasks.updateMortgageInfoDesc: Ensure all property-related documents are current.
tasks.reviewHomeownersInsuranceDesc: Update insurance policies to reflect your current properties.
tasks.updateNetWorthDesc: Reflect the change in your real estate holdings.
tasks.addBusinessAssetsDesc: Include your business as an asset with relevant details.
tasks.createSuccessionPlanDesc: Document what should happen to your business if something happens to you.
tasks.updateInsuranceDesc: Consider key person insurance and business liability coverage.
tasks.separatePersonalBusiness: Ensure personal and business assets are properly separated
tasks.separatePersonalBusinessDesc: Review the distinction between personal and business holdings.
tasks.removeDeceasedDesc: Remove the deceased person and reassign their responsibilities.
tasks.appointNewExecutor: Appoint a new executor/trustee if needed
tasks.appointNewExecutorDesc: If the deceased was your executor or trustee, designate a replacement.
tasks.updateBeneficiariesDesc2: Check if the deceased was a beneficiary on any accounts.
